original_text: He has paid the price to rescue them, and they will return home along it. They will be happy and they will sing, as they go into Zion city. They will be very happy for ever. They will never again be sad or upset. All the time they will be completely happy. He has paid the price to rescue them,
korean_text: 여호와의 속량함을 받은 자들이 돌아오되 노래하며 시온에 이르러 그들의 머리 위에 영영한 희락을 띠고 기쁨과 즐거움을 얻으리니 슬픔과 탄식이 사라지리로다

sentences.original_text: He has paid the price to rescue them
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 그들을 구원하기 위해 값을 지불했다

sentences.original_text: and they will return home along it
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그들은 그 길을 따라 집으로 돌아갈 것이다

sentences.original_text: as they go into Zion city
They will be very happy for ever
They will never again be sad or upset
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 다시는 슬프거나 화나지 않을 것이다

sentences.original_text: All the time they will be completely happy
He has paid the price to rescue them
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 그들을 구원하기 위해 값을 지불했다
